section.heading: Determination by the Department.
section.text: The Department, pursuant to the applicable provisions of the Real Property Article, may condemn any land or facility used for disposal of CHS if it determines any of the following:

para.text: The condemnation is necessary to provide for proper perpetual care and monitoring of the facility;
Future disturbance of the land poses a substantial threat to the natural resources of the State; or
The facility poses a substantial threat to the public health.
